attributes.action: Call on the government to make it unlawful to use, create or take advantage of inaccurate, incomplete or unproven analysis including false or incomplete facts (junk science),
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Call on the government to make it unlawful to use, create or take advantage of inaccurate, incomplete or unproven analysis including false or incomplete facts (junk science), to forward any cause or issue in favour of any person or organisation with regards to major lifestyle changes for the population of the United Kingdom e.g.  Smoking bans, Congestion charging, Dietary plans, Alcohol usage etc. As we have seen in the last six months, the smoking ban is doing almost irrevocable damage to the pub and club trade. Britain’s once fantastic hospitality businesses are rapidly going to the wall with the obvious consequences of lost jobs, lost profits and lost livelihoods.
All of this brought about by using half truths, manipulated statistics and absolute lies to confound and mislead the lawmakers and the general public.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
